title: Xianghaiyue Vegetarian and Drinks
description: Chinese name 香海月, address 北京路交三桥摩玛大厦一期A座A809. A small vegan restaurant with a terrace that has also a small shop for vegan bakery inside selling biscuits and bread. May be difficult find so bring the Chinese address with you. It's located in an apartment building a few hundred meters from the old location on Qingnian Road.
